post-tool-use.name: python-lint-and-format
post-tool-use.command: uvx ruff check . --fix && uvx ruff format .
post-tool-use.description: Auto-fix Python linting issues and format code

post-tool-use.name: client-lint-fix
post-tool-use.command: cd client && npm run lint --fix 2>/dev/null || true
post-tool-use.description: Auto-fix ESLint issues in client code

post-tool-use.name: client-typecheck
post-tool-use.description: Validate TypeScript types after client changes

stop.name: final-client-validation
stop.command: cd client && npm run lint --quiet && npm run typecheck
